title: Diktyotopia: Knowledge Without Borders
segmentation: Good afternoon everyone.
My name is Fidel Roddick.
I'm here to speak on behalf of the collective menu and also represented by a few member in the audience.
Emmanuel is a cross disciplinary collective.
Which aims to explore social issues about terror.

Consequently, returning to fundamental principle.

Our collective aims to create a global network through the Association of Local Microcosm.
The architect would not simply execute a command, but would act on a human scale.
He becomes the mediator in the center of the conception and creation process.
This idea is materialized by the creation of Periodical Review.
This review also establishes a platform aiming to federate the different territories and actual that we aim to collaborate with.
